snippet.title: Classic Game Gems: Warlocked 15 Minutes Game Play
snippet.description:
Warlocked is a real-time strategy video game developed by Bits Studios and published by Nintendo for the Game Boy Color. 

Play as either Humans or Beasts as you plot battle strategies. Harvest resources and construct buildings, then raise an army and order your troops into battle. Search for secret maps and train Dragons to fight on your behalf. With a powerful army at your command, you'll be ready to besiege castles, conquer enemy hordes and drive your foe from the land.

Note: I never expect to see a real time strategy game on the Gameboy color. Playing this for a while and have to say it's actually a decent game with simple control that isn't hard to pick up (have to as the GameBoy color have 2 buttons and a D-pad). A very hidden gems in the GameBoy line.

Warlocked
Copyright © 2000, Bits Studios / Nintendo
All Rights Reserved
